feed.title: Tyler Harper
feed.subtitle: A documentation site for publishing my experiences and projects.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Hello World! Welcome to my blog. I have been a developer for about 13 years at this point. I have not previously had a blog before, but I am excited to start sharing my experiences with others and help others learn from my experiences. My primary stack is the PERN stack, which is a combination of the following: PostgreSQL Express React Node.js I am about to start a new journey at ...
